00008 class Variable {
00009 
00010     const   TYPE_GET     = 'GET';
00011     const   TYPE_POST    = 'POST';
00012

00017         Variable::TYPE_GET,
00018         Variable::TYPE_POST
00019     );
00020 
00021     private $sValue;
00022     private $sType;
00023 
00031     public function __construct($sValue = '', $sType = null) {
00032         $this->set($sValue, $sType);
00033     }
00034 
00042     public function set($sValue = '', $sType = null) {
00043         if (is_null($sType)) {
00044             $sType = Variable::TYPE_DEFAULT;
00045         }
00046         $sType = strtoupper($sType);
00047         if (!in_array($sType, Variable::$aAllowedTypes)) {
00048             throw new Exception('Unknown variable type: "' . $sType . '"');
00049         }
00050         $this->sValue = $sValue;
00051         $this->sType = $sType;
00052     }

00060         return $this->sValue;
00061     }
